attributes.additional_details: Could you please help us save this field failed for the future of the children they have barbecues on their football and because on their football and games the council took away the swings I'll took away the swings years ago And also with the wildlife as well This would be nice if we could keep it as it is there is also a public right away there too
attributes.background: Penny fields was owned by the community and somehow North Somerset council have taken it over and they want to build 44 houses on the that means  that means the children of  clevedon  We'll not be able to play on there anymore and also there is and also there is wildlife there as well so please

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
